context: Tests whether the agent uses the codeflash Result type pattern from either.py and the effort-dependent configuration pattern when implementing a new pipeline feature.

checklist.name: Imports from either.py
checklist.description: Imports Success, Failure, and is_successful from codeflash.either (NOT from a different error handling module)

checklist.name: Result return type
checklist.description: Function returns Result type using Success() for success and Failure() for errors, not exceptions or None

checklist.name: is_successful check
checklist.description: Calls is_successful() or .is_successful() before calling unwrap() on the result

checklist.name: EffortKeys enum entry
checklist.description: Adds a new entry to the EffortKeys enum in config_consts.py

checklist.name: Three effort levels
checklist.description: Adds values for all three EffortLevel variants (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH) in EFFORT_VALUES dict
